main event: Clayton Warren observed a silent bright object moving across the sky on July 8, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being 100-150 feet in length and oblong or oval in shape., It moved in a steady and level flight, descending slightly before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 3-5 minutes., The object was much larger than a star and disappeared in the west., The report is part of Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force investigation of UFO sightings.
witness description: Clayton Warren, who observed the object from Hamilton AFB
